SummaryEnglish: A series of short videos from Google Japan to promote the Chrome web browser. It features the Chrome mascot explaining various features of the browser that are based upon the winning artwork submissions from a competition they held earlier in the year.

1.SummaryEnglish: "Ganbare! Chrome" Lyrics/Music: PinocchioP Voice: Sumire Uesaka Music Video Director: Hideki Inaba

2.SummaryEnglish: Thanks to the support of many users, "Ganbare! Chrome" has been decided to be made into an anime. Please enjoy watching it take shape.

1.TitleEnglish: Google Chrome Anime #1 "Ganbare! Chrome, "I want to see your smile!""
1.SummaryEnglish: Director: Takashi Otsuka Voice of Chrome: Sumire Uesaka Ending Theme: "Ganbare! Chrome" Lyrics/Composition: PinocchioP

2.TitleEnglish: Google Chrome Anime #2 "Ganbare! Chrome, "I want to be relied on by users!""
2.SummaryEnglish: Illustrator: Jun Director: Hideki Inaba Voice of Chrome: Sumire Uesaka

3.TitleEnglish: Google Chrome Anime #3 "Ganbare! Chrome, "Users are definitely still here!""
3.SummaryEnglish: Production: dwarf studios Director: Takuma Aomatsu Voice of Chrome: Sumire Uesaka Ending Theme: "Ganbare! Chrome" Lyrics/Composition: PinocchioP

4.TitleEnglish: 「がんばれ！くろーむ」 MV - Google Chrome
4.SummaryEnglish:
「がんばれ！くろーむ」

作詞 / 作曲 : ピノキオピー 
声：上坂すみれ
MV 監督 : 稲葉秀樹
